text: allatu meyyakave enkal mitu oru vetam arulappattiruntal, niccayamaka nankal avarkalaivita mikka nermaiyaka natantiruppom enru ninkal kuratirukkum poruttum (ivvetattai arulinom); akave unkalutaiya iraivanitamiruntum mikattelivana vetamum, nervaliyum, arulum vantuvittatu - evanoruvan allahvin vacanankalaip purakkanittu, avarraivittu vilakivitukinrano avanaivita atika aniyayakkaran yar? Nam'mutaiya vacanankalai vittuvilakik kolkiravarkalukku, avarkal vilakik konta karanattal kotiya vetanaiyaik kuliyakak kotuppom
